org.jcsp.util.filter
Interface FilteredSharedChannelOutput

All Superinterfaces:
ChannelOutput, FilteredChannelOutput, Poisonable, SharedChannelOutput, WriteFiltered
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteredSharedChannelOutputWrapper
public interface FilteredSharedChannelOutput
extends SharedChannelOutput, FilteredChannelOutput

Interface for an output channel end that supports filtering operations and can be shared by multiple concurrent processes.

Author:
Quickstone Technologies Limited
See Also:
SharedChannelOutput, WriteFiltered
